paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information related to the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

functional_data.summary: The Val122Ile mutation is associated with increased risk of amyloid fibril formation.

variants.population_frequency: Occurs in approximately 3.4% of the African American population.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence for pathogenicity based on clinical studies.
variants.additional_notes: This variant is the most common mutation associated with cardiac involvement.
key_quotes: The most common mutation (Val122Ile) occurs in approximately 3.4% of the African American population and exclusively has cardiac involvement.

functional_data.summary: The Thr60Ala mutation is associated with increased risk of amyloid fibril formation.

variants.evidence_level: Moderate evidence for pathogenicity based on clinical studies.
variants.additional_notes: This variant is one of the prevalent mutations in ATTR-CM.

functional_data.summary: The Ile68Leu mutation is associated with increased risk of amyloid fibril formation.

variants.evidence_level: Moderate evidence for pathogenicity based on clinical studies.
variants.additional_notes: This variant is one of the prevalent mutations in ATTR-CM.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant variants in the TTR gene were extracted successfully.
